title: WorkflowSettings
description: This schema defines the Workflow Settings.

corePoolSize.description: Default worker Pool Size. The Workflow Executor by default has this amount of workers.

maxPoolSize.description: Maximum worker Pool Size. The Workflow Executor could grow up to this number of workers.

queueSize.description: Amount of Tasks that can be queued to be picked up by the Workflow Executor.

tasksDuePerAcquisition.description: The amount of Tasks that the Workflow Executor is able to pick up each time it looks for more.

jobLockTimeInMillis.description: The amount of time a Job gets locked before being retried. Default: 15 Days. This avoids jobs that takes too long to run being retried while running.

cleanAfterNumberOfDays.description: Cleans the Workflow Task that were finished, after given number of days.

executorConfiguration.description: Used to set up the Workflow Executor Settings.

historyCleanUpConfiguration.description: Used to set up the History CleanUp Settings.
